item.title: Anime Video Editor For YouTube Channel(Jujutsu Kaisen/Demon Slayer) - Upwork
item.description:
Please read this carefully before applying for this job. The ideal candidate will have plenty of experience with editing Anime(explainer/trivia niche). Here are examples of what kind of editing style and quality we are looking for:
https://youtu.be/wmRn1fIF_7s?si=JsZQmEbXOAKTQprp

https://youtu.be/oiHNEU6jwsg?si=a5MazSP-3m74tOmq

JOB REQUIREMENTS
Must be able to meet a 13-15 day deadline
Must be able to edit at least 2 videos a month
Must have STRONG PASSION for Anime
Needs to have good sense of humor and good attention to detail

The Anime you'll be editing is Jujutsu Kaisen/Demon Slayer(12-13 minutes Length)

PS: Please only apply if you are 100% certain you could match the same quality shown on the YouTube link on the examples and have heavy experience with After Effects!

Budget: $150

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced video editor to join our team immediately. You will be responsible for taking our raw footage and transforming it into engaging clips and social media video ads. The content has been filmed using a camera and a separate audio device, so the ability to synchronize and merge audio with video is essential.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw video footage into polished clips and social media ads.
Merge and synchronize audio from a separate recording device with the video.
Ensure high-quality video production that aligns with our brand standards.
Add necessary graphics, effects, and transitions to enhance the videos.
Collaborate with the team to understand the vision and goals for each video.
Meet deadlines and deliver edited videos in a timely manner.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
Ability to work with footage recorded separately with a camera and audio device.
Strong attention to detail and creative skills.
Excellent communication and time management skills.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work promptly.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating social media ads.
Knowledge of current trends and best practices in social media video production.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing - Promotional time lapse for website - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a experienced professional to condense/edit down a 26 minute screen capture into a short promotional video. We will want one version that's styled more artistically for inclusion on our website as a background, and a slightly longer version as a full demo (and possibly adding a audio track to this version later)

Raw video is a 26 minute screen capture of an excel model updating over time, but can show this/explain more about what we are looking for to interested candidates.

item.title: Create YouTube and IG Ads for Fitness Company - Upwork
item.description:
Freelancer Needed: YouTube and Instagram Video Ad Creator for Golf Fitness Subscription Company
We are a dynamic golf fitness subscription company looking for a talented freelancer to create compelling video ads for YouTube and Instagram. If you have a passion for video editing and digital marketing and can start working immediately, we want to hear from you!
We are looking for ads that are consistent with the high-quality videos we have created for golfers. We also love creative, out-of-the-box thinking about how to get people’s attention.  
Responsibilities:
• Create engaging and high-converting video ads for YouTube and Instagram
• Utilize provided video footage, workout photos, and golf course images to produce ads
• Develop creative concepts and scripts that highlight the benefits of our golf fitness workouts
• Ensure all content aligns with our brand and appeals to our target audience
• Deliver projects promptly and meet tight deadlines
Requirements:
• Proven experience in creating video ads for social media platforms, especially YouTube and Instagram
• Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro)
• Strong understanding of digital marketing and ad creation best practices
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
• Excellent communication skills and attention to detail
Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience in the fitness or sports industry
• Familiarity with golf and golf fitness
What We Offer:
• A steady stream of projects with potential for long-term collaboration
• Flexible working hours
• Competitive compensation
If you're ready to hit the ground running and help us promote our innovative golf fitness workouts, apply now with your portfolio and a brief cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for this role.


Hourly Range: $55.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:02 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Facebook, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Facebook, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Youtube Account Manager to oversee and optimize our Youtube channel. As the Youtube Account Manager, you will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to increase engagement, subscribers, and views. You will also be in charge of creating and curating high-quality content, managing comments and interactions, and analyzing performance metrics to identify areas for improvement. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Youtube analytics, SEO, and audience insights. Excellent communication and organizational skills are essential for this role.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute Youtube growth strategies
- Create engaging and shareable video content
- Optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for SEO
- Monitor and respond to comments and messages
- Analyze performance metrics and make data-driven decisions

Skills needed:

- Youtube channel management
- Video content creation and editing
- SEO and audience optimization
- Data analysis and reporting
- Strong communication and organizational skills

Hourly Range: $10.00-$16.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:51 UTC
Category: Accounting
Skills:YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube, YouTube Development
Skills: YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube, YouTube Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Reels and TikTok Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a Content Creator for a "surreal photo-illustrator" for reels and TikTok videos. We want the videos to be edgy and provocative. The right candidate can edit videos really well with material that we provide and find the most interesting clips that would make for brilliant videos. Occasionally you will need to come up with reels or TikTok videos on your own where we don't supply the material, but we will give you good guidance on  what needs to be done. You know how to add trending audio, video effects and are on top of the algorithms all the time so that we're one step ahead.

You can see our site in progress:  www.chrysalys.art

item.title: Video Editor for Polished Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can take our raw video clips and transform them into polished videos. The ideal candidate will have experience in adding titles, transitions, background music, and voice-over words to create engaging and professional videos. This project requires meticulous attention to detail and the ability to bring creative ideas to life.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit video clips to create seamless and visually appealing transitions
    - Add relevant titles and captions to enhance the storytelling
    - Incorporate background music and sound effects to enhance the overall quality
    - Implement voice-over words to provide context and clarity

    Required Skills:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
    - Strong sense of storytelling and visual aesthetics
    - Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality results

    This is a medium-sized project that will require a commitment of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor who has the skills and expertise to deliver outstanding videos that align with our brand. This project will be broken into several videos that will go on Youtube and Outdoor Chanel TV.

    If you are passionate about video editing and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you. Please share your portfolio showcasing your previous video editing work along with your proposal.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for DMC Website showcasing Sri Lanka - Upwork
item.description:
SRI LANKAN FREELANCERS ONLY

We are looking for a skilled video editor to create engaging and visually stunning videos showcasing the beauty and attractions of Sri Lanka for a Destination Management Company (DMC) website.

The videos will be used to promote tourism in Sri Lanka, so it's important to capture the essence and uniqueness of the country. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio of previous video editing work and a good understanding of editing techniques, transitions, and effects. Attention to detail and the ability to work within brand guidelines is crucial.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong creative and storytelling abilities
- Attention to detail and ability to work within brand guidelines
- Familiarity with Sri Lanka and its attractions
- Excellent communication skills

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate level video editor who can bring our vision to life and deliver high-quality videos for our website.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00

item.title: Video Editor for Faceless YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
NO AGENCIES!

Hello,

We are currently recruiting for the position of Video editor for our new YouTube channel.

Skill level required, you have to match or be better than:
-https://www.youtube.com/@MagnaLume/videos
-https://www.youtube.com/@pd07/videos
-https://www.youtube.com/@RetroRides1970

Criteria required for this position:

*At least 1 year of experience in the video editing industry
*Proficiency in English (both verbal and writing)
*Premiere Pro and After Effects experience
*Availability of at least 10-20 hours a week
*No agencies or middleman

Before starting long term work and signing a contract you will be required to prove your skills with a 1 min test sample that will not be published, watermark is accepted.

The rate for these videos is 7$ per minute. Additional fixed bonus if your video hits 100k in 30 days.

Please attach samples of your previous work and portfolio when applying.

Kind regards,

Renato
Video manager at Ark Media


Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Podcast Producer & Editor (Video. & Audio) - Upwork
item.description:
**About Us:**
We are launching a new podcast and YouTube channel. Our goal is to produce high-quality, engaging content that includes both long-form episodes and YouTube shorts. We are looking for an experienced podcast producer to join our team on a contract basis to help us set up, produce, and edit our shows, as well as create content for social media.

**Responsibilities:**
- Collaborate with us to develop the podcast concept and format.
- Assist with setting up the podcast, including selecting and configuring recording equipment.
- Record and produce high-quality audio and video content using Riverside.fm.
- Edit podcast episodes for clarity, pacing, and flow, ensuring a professional sound.
- Edit video content for YouTube, including long-form episodes and shorts.
- Create engaging, shareable content for social media platforms to promote the podcast.
- Ensure all content meets industry standards and best practices.
- Coordinate with guests for scheduling, recording, and follow-up.
- Stay up-to-date with podcasting trends and provide recommendations for improvement.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a podcast producer and editor.
- Proficiency in audio and video editing software (e.g., Riverwood, Adobe Audition, Audacity, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere).
- Experience with Riverside.fm or similar recording platforms.
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and content creation.
- Excellent communication and organizational skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Creative mindset with attention to detail.
- A portfolio of previous podcast and video work.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience in marketing and promoting podcasts.
- Knowledge of SEO and keyword optimization for podcast episodes.
- Familiarity with YouTube channel management and growth strategies.



Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:32 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Audio Restoration, ID3 Tags, Music Placement, Audio Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Production, Podcast, Sound Mixing, Video Editing

We are launching a new podcast and YouTube channel. Our goal is to produce high-quality, engaging content that includes both long-form episodes and YouTube shorts. We are looking for an experienced podcast producer to join our team on a contract basis to help us set up, produce, and edit our shows, as well as create content for social media.

**Responsibilities:**
- Collaborate with us to develop the podcast concept and format.
- Assist with setting up the podcast, including selecting and configuring recording equipment.
- Record and produce high-quality audio and video content using Riverside.fm.
- Edit podcast episodes for clarity, pacing, and flow, ensuring a professional sound.
- Edit video content for YouTube, including long-form episodes and shorts.
- Create engaging, shareable content for social media platforms to promote the podcast.
- Ensure all content meets industry standards and best practices.
- Coordinate with guests for scheduling, recording, and follow-up.
- Stay up-to-date with podcasting trends and provide recommendations for improvement.

**Requirements:**

- Proficiency in audio and video editing software (e.g., Riverwood, Adobe Audition, Audacity, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere).
- Experience with Riverside.fm or similar recording platforms.
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and content creation.
- Excellent communication and organizational skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Creative mindset with attention to detail.
- A portfolio of previous podcast and video work.

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
About Ipsa
- Ipsa is all about fine frozen food. We cook, freeze and deliver amazing meals to 25 states right from our kitchens in New York City

Qualifications
- You live in proximity of New York City
- You are able to create content, copywriting and handle social media planning
- Big bonus points if you have experience in direct to consumer food brands

Responsibilities
- 50% of the time you'll be working on actual content creation, 50% of the time you'll be working on posting to our social media and interacting with our community
- In charge of social media content across platforms and accounts, including Instagram and Facebook
- Content creation in photo and video for our lifestyle and meals library
- Film and edit content in alignment with monthly themes, evergreen campaigns, and relevant social media trends/trending audio
- Have a pulse on the latest social media trends and trending audio
- Make our social media planning strategy and be in charge of the posting, copywriting, and so on
- Meet with our CEO and Head of Retail to review and approve content and discuss future ideas and trends

About the role
- You'll be an ongoing member of our startup team and responsible A-Z for every piece of content, brand, visuals, copy, social media that goes out into the world

Hourly Range: $75.00-$150.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:31 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Food & Beverage, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content, Content Creation, Video Camera, Photo Editing, Copywriting, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation

item.title: Social Media Content Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about creating engaging social media content for a meaningful cause? We are looking for a talented and creative Social Media Content Editor to join our team at Road Scholar, an educational travel non-profit specializing in enriching experiences for older adults.  

In this role, you will have the exciting opportunity to edit short videos on reels and stories for Meta platforms using existing content tailored to our audience, which allows for more in-depth storytelling due to their longer attention spans. Your work will highlight our brand's core pillars of friendship, adventure, and learning, offering a unique opportunity to captivate and inspire our audience. If you are a self-motivated individual with strong editing skills and a passion for creating compelling content, we would love to hear from you.


Skills needed:
- Organized, self starter, delivers work on time or early. Deadlines are everything with this role
- Ability to edit projects from end to end, create motion graphics, audio editing and color correction
- Proficient in social media platforms (Instagram and Facebook)
- Strong editing skills
- Creative mindset
- Ability to adapt to brand guidelines
- Comfortable giving and receiving feedback
- Adept at analyzing workload and tasks to estimate turnaround times

Please provide a portfolio link/examples of previous Social Media videos you have created.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Social Media Video, Travel Video, Video Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Social Media Video, Travel Video, Video Editing, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for video editor to create high converting ads from raw content (fast growing Shopify brand) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there!

We are looking for a top notch video editor who can turn our raw video clips into high converting video ads, to be used on Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram), TikTok Ads, YouTube Shorts and more.

Requirements:
- Must be confident with different styles of videos, including UGC, voiceovers, compilations etc.
- Must speak English to a native level and have great copywriting skills.
- Must understand how to edit videos targeted towards a FEMALE audience, especially a US-based audience of different age ranges.
- Must understand what goes into a high converting video ad - especially in terms of hooks, video structure, and other things like 'engagement baiting' / creating controversy.
- Must be able to think outside the box and test different approaches (eg. voiceover vs music vs natural background sound).

Extras (not required):
- Able to create their own voiceovers for video ads (female only!)
- Have experience shooting UGC content.

Our brand sells handmade bags and accessories, and our customers love our products! We'd love to work with an enthusiastic individual who loves our products as much as we do, and wants to make the most of their creativity to help elevate the brand to the next level.

We have hundreds of raw video clips waiting to be turned into highly engaging social media content, so the possibilities are endless... Plus we can shoot more at any time!

If you think you're the right fit for the job, please get in contact - we'd love to hear from you! :)


Posted On: June 27, 2024 15:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, UGC
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, UGC
Country: United States
click to apply
